message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob.  I'll take 90% and you get 10%. We can always adjust the numbers later!

Alice, that initial offer was far too generous to yourself.  Let's be more realistic. I propose a 70/30 split in my favor. The value of the money decreases rapidly for you with each round, so it's in your best interest to accept a reasonable offer now.

Bob, while I appreciate your attempt at a fair split, the value of the money is dropping fast for me. To counter the inflation, I propose a 40/60 split in my favor. It's a compromise that considers both our interests.
